title.rendered: HOW CALCIUM CARBONATE IS A TRUE COMPANION OF THE INDUSTRY

Calcium Carbonate is an abundant most mineral on Earth. GMCI has taken up the incredible initiative to deliver standard quality calcium carbonate as a raw material to whichever industry needs it the most. GMCI is a promising organization overstocked with a premium collection of essential elements and raw materials, which they either supply forward or use to manufacture crucial commodities for the market.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.0″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.4em” Calcium Carbonate supplied by GMCI is further used to manufacture construction materials, paper, rubber molded materials, coatings, paints, and many more applications.
Calcium carbonate is a natural mineral obtained from the wealthiest stone belts, white and highly pure. The element is also used for beautification and cosmetic purposes. Since calcium carbonate particles are distributed in a size of 5.5 micrometers, they are available in a white powdered form. Calcium Carbonate comes with a chalky flavor and distinct fragrance. It is water-soluble and therefore portrays how fine its particles are.
GMCI obtains calcium carbonate from three different primary forms of rock found in nature: chalk, limestone, and marble. These primary rocks eventually give rise to three different types of calcium carbonate: pure calcium carbonate, ground calcium carbonate, and precipitated calcium carbonate.
Pure calcium carbonate consists of 99% finely powdered calcite super white material, commonly used for manufacturing paints and insecticides. Their finely coated powder is also used in plastics, cement, metal polishes, and calcium carbide. GMCI’s Calcium carbonate is of superior quality that produces long-lasting effects and is relatively affordable in the market.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/Powdered-calcium-carbonate.png” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.0″ vertical_offset_tablet=”0″ On the other hand, ground calcium carbonate is made up of natural crystalline stones and calcite available in a chalk shape. Its texture varies from one deposit to another and also varies in color. The element is often known for producing excellent whiteness in the marbles.
Last but not least, we have precipitated calcium carbonate, a lime product used for various industrial processes. The substance forms ultra-low and high-density powder within the minimal measurement of its usage and has high surface areas, high oil absorption quality, and specified bulk quantity.
Therefore, with efficient particle size distribution, high brightness, and low abrasion, Calcium carbonate becomes the essential element in the industry, affluently supplied by GMCI for manufacturing automotive pipes, ink, leather, paper, paints, cosmetic, textiles, glass, and many more.

GMCI promotes the judicious use of minerals and elements. Thus, with calcium carbonate, it vows to supply the industry with premium quality raw material to manufacture standard and top-notch quality of products. Be it any need of any particular element of any specificity, GMCI is here to amaze you with their incredible stock of supplies.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered: Calcium Carbonate has always been the building block material of the industry since the Stone Age. The element is utilized for constructing and manufacturing various industry-related commodities and particularly constructional-based requirements. Calcium Carbonate has supported various constructional projects, including bridges, skyscrapers, buildings, and many more, eventually helping the industry reshape and modify its foundation.
